txt.en: 'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have come back from the Steel Keep. The corpses of friends and ancestors still roam the halls of Thikil-gundu! This can not stand! We must return to the Steel Keep and expel these fell spirits!'
Your mission is to defeat dwarf-wights in the Steel Keep.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the Steel Keep.
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
You have been tasked with defeating the dwarf-wights, still wandering the halls of Thikil-gundu.
Complete Mission: Halls of the Dead
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Steel Keep. Be careful in there, my friend!'
'Well done! With the dwarf-wights defeated, our friends and ancestors can finally rest. Thank you for your efforts.'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
Within the halls of Thikil-gundu, the corpses of dwarves of old roam the ancient keep….\n\nYour mission is to defeat dwarf-wights in the Steel Keep.
